casebody.data:
APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

2009-1498. McCostlin v. State.

Lake App. No. 2008-L-117, 2009-Ohio-4097. Discretionary appeal accepted; cause held for the decision in 2008-2502, State v. Bodyke, Huron App. Nos. H-07-040, H-07-041, and H-07-042, 2008-Ohio-6387; and briefing schedule stayed.
